S. Korean special envoy to visit Pyongyang 
     Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) - A special envoy of President Kim Dae Jung will visit Pyongyang early in April.
  The two sides will consult the grave situation facing the nation and issues of mutual concern related to the inter-Korean ties.

Greetings to CPI Congress 
      Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea today sent a message of greetings to the 18th Congress of the Communist Party of India (CPI).
 The message recalled that the CPI has made positive efforts to defend the independent development of the country and vital rights of the working masses and strengthen unity among the world progressive forces and hoped that the congress would mark a historic event of significance in further strengthening the party.    
 Expressing belief that the traditional friendly relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the future, the message sincerely wished the party congress great success in its work.
